content: Wangshu Tan is working on a project about profiling optical and microphysical properties, phase state, and liquid water content of aerosols using a multiwavelength polarized Raman-Mie scattering lidar.
summary: Wangshu Tan is working on a project about profiling optical and microphysical properties, phase state, and liquid water content of aerosols using a multiwavelength polarized Raman-Mie scattering lidar.
title: Wangshu Tan
